org.gvsig.chart.model.variables

Interface RequiredField

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Persistent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequiredField

    public interface RequiredField
extends Persistent, Cloneable
    This class represent one of the fields necessary to create a ChartDataSet with the data represented on a ChartService
    See Also:
    ChartService, ChartDataSet
